1.「うっわー！ キレーイ！| ここが 希望の丘かあ。: Whoooaaa! Kirey! This is the Hill of Hope,|huh?

4.「あの……。あなたは 次の大神官になる| ゾデラさん……ですよね？: Um... you are the next High Priestess, Mr.|Zodella... right?

6.「あのっ！ ゾデラさんっですよねっ！？: A-ha! It's Mr. Zodella, isn't it!

8.「はじめまして！ ボクは| ギザント一座の踊り子 リィディです。| 大神官の任命: Nice to meet you! I am Lydie, a dancer of the|Gizant troupe. I'm going to dance at the High|Priest's investiture ceremony.

9.「……お前は なぜ 踊り子などになった？: ...How did you become a dancer, etc.?

10.「えっと。ボク ちっちゃい頃に| シタル一座って芸人一座の 公演を見たんです。|: Let's see. When I was a little kid, I saw a|performance by the Shitalu troupe of|comedians. It was so interesting!

11.「中でも ジャンナさんっていう踊り子の踊りが| とっても きれいで あこがれちゃ: I was particularly attracted to a dancer named|Gianna because she danced so beautifully. So I|decided to join the Sitar troupe.

12.「ボクが 一座に入ったときには| ジャンナさんは もう やめてて| 座長も 今の: When I joined the troupe, Janna had already|quit and was replaced by Gizant, the current|head of the troupe...

13.「それでも いいんです。| ゾデラさんや お客さんのみんなに| 楽しんでもらえれ: That's okay. As long as Zodella and all the|customers enjoy the show, I'm happy!

14.「どんな踊りや 芸を見せられようと| 私は 楽しむことなど できない……。: Whatever dances or tricks they show me, I|cannot possibly enjoy them...

16.「お前のような 踊り子なら なおさらだ。| ……私は ダーマ神殿へ戻る。: Especially a dancer like you. ...I'm going|back to the Alltrades Abbey.

17.「……今のなに？ もしかして| 新人のボクじゃ みんなを楽しませるなんて| ムリ: What was that? Did you just say that I can't|entertain everyone as a rookie?

18.「無愛想な人だって 聞いてたけど| あんなこと 言わなくてもいいじゃん！: I'd heard he was brusque, but you didn't have|to say that!

19.「いいよ。見てなって！| ぜーったいに あの人に 楽しかったって| 言わせてやる: It's okay. Watch me! I'm going to make sure|she says she had a great time!

20.「あっ……と あぶない。| ここに来た目的を 忘れちゃうとこだったよ。| 希望の: Oh...and oh no. I almost forgot what I came|here for. I have to make a wish on the flower|of hope.

22.「このつぼみを持ち帰って| 枯れずに ちゃんと花が開いたら| 夢が かなうんだっ: He said his dream would come true if he could|take this bud home and make it bloom properly|without it withering.

23.「ボクの願いごとが 気になっちゃう？| でも 秘密だよ。ふふっ。: Are you curious about my wish? But it's a|secret. Hmmm.

24.「さ～て やることは やったし| ダーマの神殿に 戻ろっか。| お礼をするから: Well, now that we've done what we had to do,|let's go back to the Alltrades Abbey. Come|see me later to thank me.

25.「あっ <pc>さん。| 戻ってくるのを 待ってたよ。: Ah <pc>. I was waiting for you to|come back.

26.「丘まで 連れてってくれて ありがとう。| これ お礼だから 受け取って！: Thanks for taking me to the hills. Here's a|little something for you. Take it!

27.「そういえば ゾデラさんは| なんで 希望の花の丘に いたのかな？| 願いごとを: Come to think of it, why was Mr. Zodella at|the Hill of Hope? He doesn't seem like the|kind of guy who would make a wish...

28.「おい リィディ。| そんなとこで 何やってんだ？: Hey, Liddy. What are you doing up there?

29.「あっ ギザント座長。| 希望の花が咲く丘で ゾデラさんに会ったけど| あの人: Ah, Chairman Gizant. I met Mr. Zodella at the|Hill of Hope, and that man is terrible!

30.「お前みたいな踊り子じゃ みんなを| 楽しませるなんて ムリだって言われちゃった: He told me I couldn't entertain everyone with|a dancer like you! I'm so angry just thinking|about it!

31.「ああ わかった わかった。| ゾデラを ギャフンと 言わせたいってんだろ？|: Oh, I get it, I get it. You want to make|Zodella's day? Well, then you better get your|training in!

32.「さっすが 座長。わかってる～。| それじゃあ <pc>さん| ボクは けいこに: You're the chairperson. You know what you're|doing. Well then <pc> I'm going|back to Keiko!

33.「ゾデラが 希望の花の丘に……か。| やはり まだ 忘れられないんだな。: Zodera on the Hill of Hope...huh? I guess you|still can't forget.

34.「あんた……。セレドの町で 見かけたな。| あのとき オレとゾデラが| 話してい: You... I saw you in Ceredo. You saw me and|Zodella talking that time, didn't you?

36.「……グランゼドーラでの興行を終えて| ここに向かっていた途中のことだった。|: ...I was on my way here after a show in Gran|Zedora. Gianna, a dancer who was the star of|the troupe, died.

37.「ジャンナは 希望の花を取りにいって| 魔物に襲われたんだが シタル座長は| 自:
Gianna went to get the flower of hope and was|attacked by a demon, but the leader of the|troupe, Sitar, felt it was his fault and quit|
|the troupe.

38.「そしたら その座長が 神官になっててさ。| 次の大神官候補なんだって 聞いたと: Then I heard that the chairman had become a|priest. When I heard that he was a candidate|for the next high priest, I was so surprised.

39.「正直 オレは 座長のウツワじゃねえから| 酒場に呼びだして 一座に戻ってくれな:
To be honest, I'm not the head of the troupe,|so I called him up to the bar and asked him|several times to come back to the troupe, but|
|he kept refusing.

40.「自分が あこがれた シタル一座の座長が| あのゾデラだと知ったら リィディは緊: If she knew that Zodella was the leader of the|Cital troupe she had longed to be a part of,|Lydi might get too nervous to dance...

41.「あいつには 才能があるんだ。| ジャンナさえ超えられると オレは思ってる。|: He has talent. I think he can even surpass|Gianna. That's why I want this show to be a|success.

42.「いいか。ゾデラの正体を バラすなよ。| リィディだけじゃなく 神殿の誰にもだ。:
Listen up. Don't tell anyone who Zodella is.|Not just to Liddy, but to everyone in the|temple. I don't want to cause a scene here and|
|now.
